tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have consulted with Dr Nupur several times for my mother's diabetes (and occasional issues such as UTI), and also for my own healthcare. 

She has always shown utmost attention to the patient's condition and listened patiently,  and has always come up with a holistic solution, keeping age, medical history, and lifestyle conditions in mind. 

I have greatly benefited from her guidance and I would strongly recommend her as a family physician for all age groups.

review: It was good, helpful. It took 3 sittings to find out actually what I was going through. I had tests and everything but all was normal by god’s grace. Doctor was patient and understanding which made the process better.

review: Dr. Nupur is extremely patient and calm. She listened to the problem carefully and explained the line of treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Despite taking medicines, my diabetes was still high and we were unable to understand what was going wrong. 

After recommendation from a colleague, I visited Dr Nupur and to say the least it was well worth the visit despite a little distance.

She spent quality time despite a couple of waiting appointments, understood my diabetes history, my current medication. Post a couple of tests she caught the real issue and helped me get my diabetes under control. 

Her ability to identify the core problem is immaculate. 

Definitely recommend going to Dr. Nupur.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had a very pleasant experience with Dr. Nupur. She is very professional and friendly.  She spends time to build a relationship with the patient to understand your concerns and consult  accordingly . I highly recommend Dr Nupur for consultations.

review:
Excellent experience with Dr. Nupur Tandon. 

Doctor nupur tandon are amazing. She is not only convenient, but she is also extremely knowledgeable and kindd . My family makes appointments here for all of our medical needs. Dr. Nupu have experience in so many areas of medicine. We proudly consider Perfect doctor of our family doctor.


Best wishes for her bright future.
